# `<dso-dropdown-menu>`

Must contain one `button` element with `slot="button"`.

Must contain one or more `ul` elements with tabbable elements inside.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                  | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `open`   | `open`    | Whether the menu is open or closed. This attribute is reflected and mutable. | `boolean` | `false` |
